text: The 2001 Laval municipal election took place on November 4, 2001, to elect a mayor and city councillors in Laval, Quebec. Gilles Vaillancourt was elected to a fourth term as mayor, and his municipal party won every seat on city council. ==Results== === Mayor === ===Council=== {| style="width:600px;" class="wikitable" |+ 2001 Laval election, Councillor, District One |- style="background-color:#E9E9E9" !
